title: How can someone listen to your conversations with your cell phone when they are not around you? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’ve probably had someone nice enough to install some kind of spyware on your smartphone. If indeed it is a smartphone. Even if it’s a landline phone, you should probably start looking around for some kind of recording device. They can be rather small and you might never find it using the traditional method of eyes. Luckily, you can buy an RF signal detector pretty cheaply on the net. If there’s the possibility someone could have installed spyware on your device there are some steps that you can follow.
